trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods and fields for initiating drag-and-drop operations, including a method to begin a drag-and-drop operation, and facilities for adding and removing drag-and-drop related event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 提供用以啟始拖放作業的 Helper 方法與欄位，包括開始拖放作業的方法，以及用以加入及移除拖放相關事件處理常式的機能。

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop commonly refers to a method of data transfer that involves using a mouse (or some other pointing device) to select one or more objects, dragging these objects over some desired drop target in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], and dropping them.
trans-unit.target: 拖放功能一般是指資料傳送的方法，這種方法需要使用滑鼠 (或其他一些指標裝置) 選取一或多個物件，將這些物件拖曳到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中一些想要的置放目標上，然後置放這些物件。

trans-unit.source: A drag-and-drop operation is analogous to a copy (or cut)-and-paste operation that is used to transfer data from one object or application to another.
trans-unit.target: 拖放作業相當於複本 （或剪下）-和-貼上用來將資料從一個物件或應用程式之間傳輸的作業。

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop operations typically involve two parties: a drag source from which the dragged data originates and a drop target which receives the dropped data.
trans-unit.target: 拖放作業通常牽涉到兩個合作對象： 從拖曳來源被拖曳的資料來源以及在置放目標會接收已卸除的資料。

trans-unit.source: The events and methods required for drag-and-drop operations are defined in the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop> class.
trans-unit.target: 拖放作業所需的事件和方法會在 <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop> 類別中定義。

trans-unit.source: The drag-and-drop events are attached events that can be attached to any <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 拖放事件所附加的事件可附加至任何<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: The drag source and drop target may be UI elements in the same application or in different applications.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳來源和置放目標可能會在相同的應用程式或不同的應用程式的 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: However, the drop target must know how to process the data being passed by the drag source.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在置放目標必須知道如何處理拖曳來源傳遞的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> classes contain aliases for the drag-and-drop events so that the events appear in the class members list when these classes are inherited as a base class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>類別包含拖放事件的別名，如此會顯示事件類別的 [成員] 清單中，但這些類別會繼承基底類別。

trans-unit.source: When you attach an event handler to a drag-and-drop event on one of these classes, the handler is attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop> event and they receive the same instance of event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至這些類別的其中一個上拖放事件時，附加處理常式的基礎<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop>事件，而且接收事件資料的相同執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For example, see <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The drag source initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method and passing the transferred data to it.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳來源會呼叫靜態 <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> 方法，並將所傳送的資料傳遞給該方法，來啟始拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: An element typically handles the following events when it is a drag source:
trans-unit.target: 項目通常會處理下列事件時拖曳來源：

trans-unit.source: An element typically handles the following events when it is a drop target:
trans-unit.target: 項目通常會處理下列事件時，它在置放目標：

trans-unit.source: For more information and examples, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[拖曳和卸除概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> event handler to a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> 事件處理常式加入指定的相依性物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event occurs when an object is dragged into the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>物件拖曳至目的範圍時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>事件。

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewDragEnterHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewDragEnterHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> event handler to a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> 事件處理常式加入指定的相依性物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> event occurs when an object is dragged out of the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave>物件拖出的項目界限，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewDragLeaveHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewDragLeaveHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver" /> event handler to a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver" /> 事件處理常式加入指定的相依性物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver> event occurs when an object is dragged over the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver>項目的界限拖曳物件時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver> event.

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> event occurs when an object is dropped within an element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>物件卸除的項目範圍內時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> event occurs when n object is dragged over the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> n 個物件拖曳的項目邊框上方時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver>事件。

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddDragOverHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入此事件反昇版本的處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddDragOverHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop> event occurs when an object is dropped within an element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop>物件卸除的項目範圍內時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop>事件。

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddDropHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入此事件反昇版本的處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddDropHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback" /> 事件處理常式加入指定的相依性物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback> event occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback>拖曳作業期間發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback>事件。

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddGiveFeedbackHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入此事件反昇版本的處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddGiveFeedbackHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag" /> event handler to a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag" /> 事件處理常式加入指定的相依性物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag>事件發生於拖放作業，並可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入此事件反昇版本的處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag" /> event handler to a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag" /> 事件處理常式加入指定的相依性物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件發生於拖放作業，並可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the dependency object that is the source of the data being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 相依性物件的參考，此物件為要拖曳之資料的來源。

trans-unit.source: A data object that contains the data being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 包含要拖曳之資料的資料物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragDropEffects" /> values that specifies permitted effects of the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragDropEffects" /> 值，這個值會指定拖放作業允許的效果。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 啟始拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragDropEffects" /> values that specifies the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragDropEffects" /> 值，這個值會指定在拖放作業期間執行的最終效果。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of your application to determine when a drag occurs, and then initiate the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 負責應用程式，判斷拖曳，就會發生，然後再啟始拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is when a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> sequence of events occurs over the element to be dragged.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是當<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>一連串事件會透過拖曳的項目。

trans-unit.source: You initiate the drag-and-drop operation by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method and passing the transferred data to it.
trans-unit.target: 您藉由呼叫靜態啟始拖放作業<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>方法並傳遞給它來傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method will automatically wrap the data in a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> if necessary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> 方法會視需要自動將資料包裝在 <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> 中。

trans-unit.source: For greater control over the data format, you can wrap the data in a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> before passing it to the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 為了進一步控制資料格式，您可以將資料包裝在 <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> 中，再傳遞給 <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.Effects%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set in the drop target’s <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 從傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>方法是值<xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.Effects%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中拖放目標屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If the return value does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>, the drag-and-drop operation is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的值不符合其中一個`allowedEffects`呼叫中指定<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>，不會執行拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initiate a drag-and-drop operation from the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event handler of an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> element to make it a drag source.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何從 <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> 項目的 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> 事件處理常式啟始拖放作業，使該項目成為拖曳來源。

trans-unit.source: The transferred data is the string representation of the ellipse’s <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳送的資料是橢圓形之 <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A> 屬性的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The data is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method as a string and is automatically wrapped in a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 資料傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>做為字串的方法，在自動換行<xref:System.Windows.DataObject>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dragSource" /> or <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dragSource" /> 或 <paramref name="data" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event occurs when an object is dragged into the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>物件拖曳至目的範圍時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnterEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的通道版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnterEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> attached event
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> event occurs when an object is dragged out of the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave>物件拖出的項目界限，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeaveEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的通道版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeaveEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver" /> attached event
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver> event occurs when an object is dragged over the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver>項目的界限拖曳物件時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOverEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的通道版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOverEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop" /> attached event
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> event occurs when an object is dropped within an element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>物件卸除的項目範圍內時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDropEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的通道版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDropEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback" /> attached event
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback> event occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback>拖曳作業期間發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback>事件。

trans-unit.target: 此事件的通道版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedbackEvent>。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnterEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件反昇版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnterEvent>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave> event occurs when an object is dragged out of the element's bounds.

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> event occurs when n object is dragged over the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> n 個物件拖曳的項目邊框上方時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop> event occurs when an object is dropped within an element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop>物件卸除的項目範圍內時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop>事件。

trans-unit.target: 此事件反昇版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DropEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback" /> attached event
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback> event occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback>拖曳作業期間發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedbackEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件反昇版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedbackEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag" /> attached event
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag>事件發生於拖放作業，並可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDragEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件反昇版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDragEvent>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag" /> attached event
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag" /> 附加事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件發生於拖放作業，並可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: This field identifies the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會識別反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an identifier for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDragEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的通道版本識別項，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDragEvent>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event occurs when an object is dragged into the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>物件拖曳至目的範圍時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemovePreviewDragEnterHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemovePreviewDragEnterHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> event occurs when an object is dragged out of the element's bounds.

trans-unit.target: 若要移除的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemovePreviewDragLeaveHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 若要移除的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemovePreviewDragOverHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter>物件拖曳至目的範圍時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDragEnterHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除反昇的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDragEnterHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave> event occurs when an object is dragged out of the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave>物件拖出的項目界限，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDragLeaveHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除反昇的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDragLeaveHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> event occurs when n object is dragged over the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> n 個物件拖曳的項目邊框上方時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDragOverHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除反昇的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDragOverHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop> event occurs when an object is dropped within an element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop>物件卸除的項目範圍內時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDropHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除反昇的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveDropHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback> event occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback>拖曳作業期間發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewGiveFeedback>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveGiveFeedbackHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除反昇的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveGiveFeedbackHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag>事件發生於拖放作業，並可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the tunneling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的通道版本<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除反昇的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemoveQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />) from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要移除其中事件處理常式的相依性物件 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />)。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 參考要移除之處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag" /> event handler from a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的相依性物件中移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件發生於拖放作業，並可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除的處理常式的反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: To remove a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemovePreviewQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.RemovePreviewQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>。
